title: Can this safer nuclear fuel make a comeback? – This Week in Cleantech
description: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, hosts Paul Gerke Mike Casey discuss the potential comeback of “tri-structural isotropic” or TRISO nuclear fuel, which is much safer but much more expensive than low-enriched uranium.
content: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, hosts Paul Gerke Mike Casey discuss the potential comeback of “tri-structural isotropic” or TRISO nuclear fuel, which is much safer but much more expensive than low-enriched uranium.
